content.detailedDescription: I am a sergeant with a state police agency; while on patrol on a side street near the 8700 block of north milwaukee avenue in niles, illinois on the evening of thursday, 07/03/2014, at approximately 2315 hours, my eye was caught by two (2) pulsing round red lights in the sw sky, one on top of the other, which appeared to be a cell or water tower in the vicinity of maryhill cemetery. this caused me to do a complete double-take, because i know there are no such structures in that area. when one of the objects began moving slowly from west to east, and the other followed in a "wing-man"-type formation (slightly behind and further south than the object to the forefront), i thought, because of their basketball-like appearance and large size, that they were helicopters of the "bubble-cockpit" variety, flying low on the southern horizon. i parked my squad car and shut off my engine and all lights, and exited my squad car to observe the aircraft. as soon as i got out of my car, i realized that these were not helicopters, and were much farther away and larger than i originally thought. there was no helicopter sound whatsoever in the relatively quiet night air, and the presence of many airplanes in the sky (niles and park ridge are under major flight paths in and out of o'hare)provided me with an excellent contrasting point of reference to what the ufos at least "were not." the objects glided eastbound, slowly and deliberately. they were basketball-sized spheres, approximately 5-times the size of the strobe lights on an airplane, with a shimmery white halo completely circling the sphere. the red light was unlike anything i have ever seen, having a pulsating, almost "liquid" or "living" appearance, and glowing, rather than piercing the night sky. the white light appeared like an aura (similar to the heat you see emanating from a rocket or jet engine). i was awestruck. when the first craft was almost directly in front of my line of sight, the spheres both suddenly "receded" quickly up and into the western sky (back where i first saw them, but much higher). the ufo that was offset to the rear disappeared so quickly that i barely had time to register that it was gone. the craft that was more "in the lead" receded up and back to the point that it looked like a red star, and then blinked out of sight. i saw that there were two adult male citizens, one african-american and one caucasian, looking up at the sky from a residential driveway across the street and south of my location. i approached them and we all verbally confirmed that what we had seen had not been fireworks or flares of any kind, but were definitely very large, unidentifiable aircraft. we were all very excited. i remember that my emotions were in a "condition red" or "high alert" status - i remained in this psychological state for many hours after the sighting. the african-american citizen kept repeating "warp speed! they took off into space at warp speed!" two things i would like to point out are that 1. for the 20 minutes or so prior to this sighting, i was unable to connect to the internet on both my blackberry cell phone or my in-car panasonic tough book laptop with verizon air card. five minutes after the spheres ascended out of sight, both my telephone and in-car computer came back online. 2. i did not think to take photos of the craft because the camera on my blackberry produces very poor quality photos. i've tried to take pictures of the full moon in the past, and they come out as a blurry white pin-dot of light. i am working on getting a record of any 911 calls for suspicious lights in the sky during this time period.
content.summary: I am a sergeant a state police agency; while on patrol, i observed two red spherical ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
While working at a youth facility in ecorse, michigan. i decided to take a break and went out side to parking lot in the rear of the building.
facility was near the air port. i watched the commercial airliners approach for landing to see if i could identify all of the planes coming in for a landing. suddenly all air traffic stopped. i looked to the left and to my surprise there were two very large, metallic gray objects flying in formation. one was slightly below and to the rear of the other. the altitude of the objects was very low. it was a clear, bright sunny day. no clouds. around 2 or 3:00pm. they moved across the sky very slowly. suddenly the object that was below and slightly to the rear of the other changed position. in a split second it moved from the rear to the front. maintaining altitude and taking a position in the lead. it took less than a micro second. both objects continued on their path with out changing speed. each object was large enough to carry two maybe three average sized occupants. i watched these objects until they were too far to see. it was at that time that air traffic resumed. i did not report the event to anyone in authority because i thought they would deny anything happened and they would think i was crazy.
content.summary: Flying near detroit metro air port in path of approaching commercial air craft on landing path. air triffic abruptly stopped.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in the drive way with my daughter watching fireworks from around the neighborhood. i was watching the skies to see f i would see anything odd. i like to watch for ufos anyway. i noticed the star like object moving across the night sky at 10:30ish i first thought it was a satellite. but then i noticed it was pulsating slowly not flickering like an airplane. i noticed it moving to the east from west traveling pretty quickly and the event lasted about 15 seconds. i felt not sure of what i was seeing since i wasn't sure if this was a ufo or not. i  didn't lose sight of it, i jumped up to go get my husband but he was sleeping. my daughter saw it with me. so i didn't wake him up i figured he wouldn't believe me anyway.
content.summary: Saw a glowing starlike pulsating slowly orb like star traveling from west to east at 90 degrees.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking over balcony in a north direction when i saw a white light in the clouds. it broke into four white orbs that rotated in clockwise motion then came back as one light. this was a repeating pattern hovering over the same location. there was no obvious light coming from the ground like a dealership. there was also no horizontal light seen from the direction of the airforce base or airport. there was no visible or audible ctaft in the area such as planes or heliocopter.
content.summary: One lighti was on balc split to four then returned to one repeating pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my backyard looking in the sky at 11pm 6/29/14, checking out the stars like i always do ,watch a jet from nyc fly over to my west real high, i see them fly by al the time every night 4-8 at least always going by, plus my local airport tweed new haven , in my back yard so i been seeing planes of all different types and helicopters all my life  .I was scanning the sky  to the east and then this disc object with continuous light going from my right to left with a red light in the middle of the length of the white lite all on the same line path ,and i started watching the lights and then you could see an object it was moving left to right back and forth and then up in down in the same area just hovering and the lights spinning around it i watched continuously for a good 12 minutes then it just took off gone. i know the sky around my area where the stars are and the flight paths, it took me all this time just to tell you guys,
on  monday night june 30 i went out like i do every night this time about 12;30am went to check  out the sky from the night before no stars there everything normal ,then all of  a sudden over to the right 30% 2 circle disc objects appear out of no where basically over my garage straight up in your face, discs appear with a red light in the white just like the night before but they bump into each other or it seemed like they did then one went up to the left on a 35% angel and at the same time there one went straight to the right they both stopped seemed like the one on the left was waiting to see what the one on right was going to do meanwhile they are hovering the white light kept spinning with the red lite in the middle and the one on the right just takes off to the right i tried to follow it but at the same time the one on the left took off straight up less than a second after i stopped in my tracks and just switched my head to left while i was looking to the right and they were both  gone. one up and one to the right
caught me off guard because i still had sunday night sighting in my head ,then this happened the second sighting monday happened just has quick as i described it but long enough to know what i saw. i started running to the right by the time i made my first step it was out of site.
oh yea by the way not a firework either and not planes
havent told anybody yet except mufon,i finally know that feeling people talk about after having a sighting your stunned ,second guessing yourself ,thought about the 2 incindent sec by sec over and over
and i concluded i saw what i saw and time to tell mufon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Sunday june 29 2014 standing in back yard about 11pm 12;30am local airport closed

content.detailedDescription: I got out of bed to take a photo of the blood moon event. i took two photos and then went back to bed. it wasn't until recently i took a look at them. the first picture was just a picture of the full moon before the event. the picture showing the blood moon had a bright white light zig zag in a small area. when enlarging you can see a red light lower down that does not move. the red light is probably coming from a house down the valley. the zig sagging light can not be a bug, i had no exterior lights on at the time.
content.summary: Did not see it until i looked at photo on computer.

content.detailedDescription: i am a deputy sheriff and was on duty shortly after 0500 hrs. in the first part of june 2014.  i was parked near the intersection of us hwy 67 and texas hwy 137.  i observed a very bright white light slowly approaching from the west.  it appeared to be a landing light of an aircraft and i thought it was coming to our airport.  i first saw the light at a range of approximately four miles.   the light seemed to be about 500 feet off the ground.  at about two miles the light slowly started to change to a southeasterly direction as though to keep from flying over the town of big lake.   as the light got to about 90 degrees to me, i realized that the light was not diminishing in intensity or shape.  i thought that was quite unordinary and got out of my patrol vehicle.  i watched as the light continued on in a southeasterly direction toward the city of eldorado in schleicher county.  i watched this very, very bright light for at least ten minutes.  it never changed in brightness or shape while approaching, when crossing in front of me, or when going away.  the light just continued on until i could no longer see it. i believe the light never got closer than 1 or possibly 2 miles.  i did tell another deputy about the incident shortly thereafter.  no other.   [initials removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Bright white light, never changed while approaching, when passing, or when going away.

content.detailedDescription: Ok two people witnessed an orange glow appear out of no where moving really slow in the south west sky about 50 feet above a tree line, the object almost looked like it stopped once or twice, it then started to climb gradually to almost 300 feet above the tree line and then just disappeared.  no clouds in the sky and before and after event they could see planes flying around, during event nothing was making any sounds even the animals were quiet.  this location has reported other strange objects in the skies and i have one video of oval shaped grey objects changing directions, hovering and flying around during filming of a storm a little over a year ago. starting to think this could be a hot spot.....  this area is inline with the greater cincinnati airport so i didn't think much of the first sightings but now that i have been watching and taking notes i think there might be something going on out here.  i have been around planes all my life and so has the other witness and this sighting was not a plane and the video can not be planes.
content.summary: Orange glow moving very slow

content.detailedDescription: This happened to me last night in west carrollton, oh, i took the dog out around midnight to find a strange looking cloud similar to a roll cloud moving quickly, longways as a serpent would. i stretched as far as the eye could see, the consistency appeared more like shaving creme than mist, and it had peculiar alternating curls on each side. i watched the cloud as it traveled out of my city and was startled by the silhouette of a giant black triangle, completely silent and still hovering in front of a cloudbank that was illuminated by the city. i decided the combination of this unnatural and eerie cloud formation and the giant black triangle would be enough to finally vindicate me with my wife who finds my interest in the unexplained distasteful. after around five minutes of prodding i dragged her outside. and the triangle was gone, the sky was clearing and stars visible. she stormed in, frustrated again by her "lunatic husband". i stared up at the stars where the previously unnoticed and rapidly expanding puffy white clouds where racing toward one another.  the moment the door slammed shut two tine white orbs that seemed to have long straight tails streak through the cloud cover.  they resembled the little firecrackers in twisted white paper you give you kids to throw at the sidewalk while you light the real ones. i had seen the combination of strange cloud behavior and super fast white orbs recently, so i hoped i could expect to see more. and for the next four hours i witnessed more abundant and varied phenomenon then i ever would have expected. i still have a flip phone with a terrible camera so it was too dark when i attempted to take pictures. a brief description of the happenings; a black helicopter with a bright green light came into the area where i was observing the clouds. it was quieter than the blackhawks i became accustomed to at ft. campbell, but bot nearly silent. it hovered briefly overhead, the turned to pursue a thick smooth puff of cloud as it started to suddenly rapidly ascend towards the main cloud cover. the cloud seemed to have a slight glow and as it speed off the rear fanned slightly making it look like a little flying whale. s i lost sight of them quickly behind the treeline. shortly thereafter, noticed a dim bluish pulsing light coming from the larger group of clouds. the mist settled quickly and i thought there could be craft overhead but when i stared my vision became blurry and my eyes wouldn't focus. repeated attempts to avert and clear my eyes and observe the object through the mist began to give me a strong headache. by the eerie way they moved and the abnormal consistency i assumed that something other than then nature was influencing them. however i decided to check around the back of my building as it has less lightposts and better visibility, not sure how long i sat out there, but just when i was about to give up a glowing yellowish white ball of light dropped straight out of the sky, i couldn't judge the distance properly or discern where it came from, it seemed to just materialize at high altitude and drop straight down. however a few minutes a an aircraft ascended at a steep angle from what seemed to be where the glowing ball must have fallen. this craft was possibly unrelated as we are close to an airport. had rapidly flashing red and white lights just as civilian craft, yet it was silent and moved very fast. i remained outside a short time, until my growing headache compelled me to call it a night. (note- as this report involves multiple objects i was unable to fill out the preceding form accurately)
content.summary: Heavy mist and  roll cloud over west carrollton is followed by  ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back deck, and it was an extremely dark,the night sky was crisp and clear, was looking around trying to spot a satellite passing over when i noticed this very bright light coming towards me from the northwest. it was quite a way off so i grabbed my binoculars and was amazed to see this orb, glowing a very bright red, as it slowly made a turn to the direct west, it actually looked like it had a funnel type beam of light shining upwards. from where i was on my deck i could only follow this thing for a minute or two until it went behind a tree line. when the orb went behind the tree line, i stayed on the deck saying out loud to myself,"please return" "please return". i was amazed at what i had just seen and just knew that know one living in the household would believe me. 
 i was always skeptical of other peoples sightings, but i now am a believer.
content.summary: Extremely bright red light in a very clear cool night, was star gazing when i spotted object.

content.detailedDescription: I were in my living room me and my brother and i look out the glass front door and i saw a light beaming down so i went out side to see what it may be and it were .Just as i say a round dic shape saucer with lights. so i call my brother out side to be my witness and he started to follow behind it and i keep calling him back by that time the saucer turn to the right nw and we couldn't see it anymore because of trees. when i first saw it from my glass door i thought maybe it was a helicopter beaming it lights but there were no helicopter sounds, so that was strange that why i went out side. we were both shock we were afraid to tell anyone but later when we did they call us crazy...I never felt so fraighten in my life and even today i am still wondering why no one else came forward, but some one told me, there were a lady, said she saw it aswell and she waas afraid too talk about it. today after all those years have pass i know and will stick by what i/we saw that night..I will never for get it...We had a good look at this saucer it were moving ver slow at first and then it turn side ways and speed up just a little as if it knew we were watching. the thing was at tree top and very large, with no wind just a hum and or buzz sound. no one believed us sao my brother say for us not to talk about it to anyone again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It look as if it were solid steel with small windows, made a hum sound

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were standing on the front porch talking around 12:30am this morning july 4th, 2014. when an airplane flying se to nw was passing over the top of house and i seen two(2) star-like but very dim objects flying on the right side of the plane and one(1) one the left a little higher or further in front of the airplane. as if they were following or maybe escorting the airplane, i turned to my wife pointed up at the airplane and told her to look at the lights following the airplane, she also acknowledged these very dim lit "escorts". we watched it as it passed directly over us bearing nw  when one of two on the left, which the two on the right before passing over us is now on the left, made an abrupt u-turn like change of direction and headed se directly over us again. we stood there in awe, talked about it for a minute or two, then she walked to our vehicle to get her phone charger. while she was standing in the door of the truck i looked up towards the last direction i seen the airplane, nw, and seen 7 dim lit objects flying, in a perfect hexagon formation and one flying in the middle, fly directly over me the same altitude it seemed, but moving faster. i yelled for my wife to come and look, as she was climbing the steps i looked away from the 7 objects to my wife and i turn back pointed se over the top of the house and she also seen them until they faded out.
content.summary: 3 objects followed plane, one abruptly changed direction back se. 5-7 minutes later, 7 in formation bearing se

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my front yard facing east at about 3:30 am when i saw a bright pulse of light directly to the east.  this was followed by another pulse of light about 10 degrees to the north 25-30 seconds later.  this was followed by another pulse 10 degrees further north then another pulse 10 degrees down in the sky.  then another pulse of light now 10 degrees to the south and another and another until this had happened about 10 times and the object was heading south over the hills by mt. diablo.  the entire circuit the bright pulses of light described was the shape of an eye starting at the top and making an oval flight path in a counter-clockwise direction starting in the east then north then down then finally trailing off towards the horizon in the south.  the light would start from nothing then pulse to a brightness similar to or brighter than venus then fade out.  this is why i call it a pulse and not a flashing light because of slowness and apparent deliberate and constant rate of motion.  this was an intelligently operated craft.  after the last pulse of light from the u.F.O. receding to the south a brilliant light zoomed over my head from west to east from just above me arcing about 20 degrees forward to the east.  it didn't look like a falling star in that it was much brighter and had an even brightness to it and it left a trail, not a vapor trail but some kind of ionization trail which glowed a bluish pink color.  it looked like the heat distortion you see on hot pavement but it did not look fiery, but rather the trail looked cool.  i've never seen a falling star that perfect and that impressive: it made my adrenaline race.  to me it was the u.F.O.'s grand finale for me as it's witness.
content.summary: A series of bright starlike flashing lights every 25-30 seconds displaying a directional changed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work.
 i noticed the lights when i was looking at some of the fire works that were being shot off. 
 my first thought was, "those aren't fireworks." the objects were over an area that was made up of cul de sacs and a cemetery.
 they were oval/circular, bright orange and i'd swear there was a triangle in the middle.
 i lost sight of them when i turned north. was hoping i'd be able to see them from my house, but couldn't.
content.summary: 5 bright orange globes in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was out side smoking and the neighbors a block or so from me were doing fireworks.

i have a lot of trees in my back yard that block out a lot of the sky. but coming from my left side i saw an amber light moving very quickly. i would compare the speed to the plane. it flew overhead about 20 seconds after i lost the light in the trees. the plane was heading the opposite direction, i live in the flight path of springfield's airport. i could clearly hear and see the plane, but i could tell there was no sound coming from the light. it made no sound at all. 

i also thought the airport wouldn't have a flight take off and have one land heading basically at each other that closely timed.

my first obvious thought was the chinese lanterns-it's the fourth of july, i realize people let those go and can be perceived as a ufo. there was/is no wind, the noaa site says it's a 6mph wind-heading ne, not nw! additionally, the height, i didn't think the lanterns could get that high in the air. 

i have also seen the international space station, as well as the tiangong-1 on several occasions, but i've never seen them an amber colored.

i saw an amber light before, several years ago, august 2011, maybe 2012? ii was living in branson-a town about an hour away. that time, the amber light just ascended from behind a hill hit a cloud i could see the entire cloud-but the light never popped out, above the cloud. 

my wife and animals were all inside tonight, so no one was affected or had seen the object.

the picture is terrible light (most phone pictures are). it's all i had at the time and not sure if you can clean it up but i know i got the object, rather the picture reveals it or not! 

and the fact that it's almost the fourth of july makes me a bit skeptical, but i am always looking up for one of the ufos to get me excellent footage one day! -been a mufon member for couple years now.
content.summary: Amber light seen

content.detailedDescription: I attended the taste of oak brook in oak brook, il with my family on thursday july 3. we were there mainly to see the fireworks. we headed out to the parking lot before the fireworks show ended to beat the crowd. this was approximately 9:30pm. as we walked south i looked up to my right because there was a beautiful crescent moon (i'm a habitual sky watcher). it was then that i noticed a lit up object that looked stationary down to the left of the moon. at first i thought it must be an airplane or chinese lantern (some had been released before the fireworks), but the longer i looked i knew this was something different. my gut instinct told me to keep watching, and i then realized this object was hovering. it then suddenly started moving to the right for a few seconds, stopped quickly to hover again, then suddenly started moving to the left. the object had a row of 3 to 5 non - flashing red lights. below the red lights was a shorter row of 2 or 3 green lights that flashed rhythmically in a pulsating manner. i had seen this before at a greater distance a while back outside my home, and recognized the similarity immediately. the feeling it caused made my hair stand on end, it was quite surreal to see the lights that clearly. unfortunately i could not make out the shape of the object, but it seems it would be an elongated shape of some sort. we were on our way out of the parking lot being directed by traffic police so we were unable to stop, and as it got smaller and farther away i lost sight of it. very interesting experience, and i still can't shake the crazy feeling it left me with!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object alternated between hovering and suddenly changing direction... row of non - flashing red lights above a row of green flashing / pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were having a bonfire in our backyard when we see a orange glow coming towards us at a slow speed. it was very bright and was not making any sound or blinking like a plane.  my first thought was it was part if a fire work that went off but the wind was blowing south and this orb was heading north. it flew over us and gradually dimmed until we couldn't see anything. 

a second one which looked just like the first came at the same direction as the first.  recorded a video of it.
content.summary: Glowing orange orbs glided over us and slowly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was on my way to my storage and saw a bright green light reflecting off the hood of my truck.  looked up in the sky and saw a bright green diamond/round pulsating light moving very rapidly from the se heading nw.  it made me miss a shift and i looked away for a couple of seconds.  i came to a clearing where there is an elementary school and stopped.  the light had changed direction to directly south best as i could tell.  i did not see it change direction as i had to look where i was shifting, but it seemed to have increased speed and faded from sight rapidly.  there was absolutely no sound and the sky was clear.  at first i thought it may have been a meteorite but they don't change direction at such a sharp angle as i try to catch meteor shows when they are forecast to appear.  i have never seen one change direction however, other than a very slight curve.  i tried to catch it on my cell phone camera but strangely, the battery had died, and it had almost disappeared from sight anyways.
content.summary: Extremely bright green light like stoplight green but brighter

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a friend's house in the vestavia area near birmingham on a surprisingly cool night. i got in my car and opened the sunroof. i opened my  looked up at the sky and saw a bright object, that easily enough could have passed for a bright star. though this bright point started erratically "bounced" around making amazing sharp motions but never left this portion of the sky.
content.summary: Bright point of light in vestavia makes sharp erratic turns

content.detailedDescription: I snapped a picture in full manual mode on my camera.  i took several today and cleaned the lense this morning,  after posting this photo i saw this other thing in the photo.  have fun with it as it beats the hell outta me what it is.
content.summary: Noticed the thing after posting to facebook.

content.detailedDescription: on thursday, 7/3/14 at approximately 1040 hours, my girlfriend [name removed/cms/dr] and i had just walked out the back of our apartment building located at 7079 w 84th way in arvada, colorado, and had been heading sw when we had looked into the sky, and observed 2 cylindrical disc objects one on top of the other flying ne at a high rate of speed, and off up into the clouds disappearing. the 2 objects were not airplanes, and had no wings. fighter jets occassionally fly over the area where we live, and we will hear them. these made no sound, and had a white grey color to them. both {name removed/cms/dr], and i have not been able to stop talking about our experience today,and would definetly speak with anyone concerning this sighting.
content.summary: Observed 2 ufo's flying in sync one above the other at a high speed, and disappearing into the clouds. definetly was not a airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: woodlands camp; concord ga.

i was playing a game in the woods with a few friends, and i came to a rest, and sat on a log.We had just started a new round of the game, and an airplane went over head. i used the noise from the plane to hide my movement, as a ran to a new log.
reclining on it, i looked up into the sky to observe the stars. i settled upon one, a golden hued one that seemed slightly lower than the rest of them.

we had just started a new round of the game, and an airplane went over head. i used the noise from the plane to hide my movement, as a ran to a new log.

just as i noticed it, it started moving. for an unknown reason, i felt euphoric as i watched it. it had a solid core visible while moving, but when it was still, it was indistinguishable from a star. it had two different auras, a cloud like one farthest from the core, and more star like one near the center. 

the light was clearly emanating from it, and was not a residual glow.

i checked my watch for the time, to record this, but my watch light malfunctioned and wouldn't turn on. it was at least thirty minutes after eleven.

as it zoomed by, one thing i noticed was that i do not recall hearing any sound, while cicadas, footsteps of my friends, wind blowing could be heard before the object caught my attention.

 the minuscule object eventually went beyond my field of view. a plane flew over head again, going the opposite direction, just as i stood up.

one other person said they saw it, but stayed focus on the game, and didn't pay too much attention to it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like object starts moving golden brown hue, moved across horizon.

content.detailedDescription: In june of 1961, my two brothers and i, ages 11,9, and 14 were playing baseball in a lot next to my parents house located in the valley area of albuquerque,n.M. we saw a red streak fly overhead at a phenomenal speed, no noise. we saw it go towards the west mesa about 10 miles from the valley due west and it turned back towards the east. we saw it come near our neighborhood, but it was about two blocks south of our house. we ran down the ditch towards the area where it came down. when we came out into the empty field, it was hovering above a big cottonwood tree. it was a large sphere,dull grey in color about 30' to 40' in diameter with a red blinking light on top and another on the bottom.It hummed like a muffled helicopter engine as it rotated. there were windows on the upper half of the sphere and it was rotating very slowly. my brothers and i were no more than 30' feet away from it and we were astonished to say the least. we started yelling at it and as we did, it moved to the northeast about 70 feet and stopped rotating. we could see figures peering out the windows on the craft and at that point, we decided to get away from there. it then took off due east and as it did, it turned red from it's velocity and was over the sandia mountains in a matter of seconds, distance of about 20 miles from the valley. we watched the 10pm news and several people saw it, but it was reported as an advertising balloon.I don't know if anyone was as close as we were.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere hovered above trees for 15 minutes or less. witnessed by 3 people.

content.detailedDescription: On friday night, june 27, 2014 we drove into our driveway and my wife pointed out some "beautiful stars." there was no visible moon. i looked up, and saw a  white silver-dollar-sized flash up there among the stars. we then noticed a red-orange dot travelling from east to west. it looked like a star. then it flashed again. as we watched, we noticed it would flash every ten seconds regularly. it went quite a distance horizontally. my wife exclaimed that it was like having someone photograph us with a flash camera.  all in all we counted five such flashes. then the object abruptly turned and headed south. it stopped flashing once it changed direction. the flashes we had witnessed were much bigger that the typical strobe on a airplane. we watched it travel south until it passed out of sight.
content.summary: On friday night, june 27, 2014 we drove into our driveway and my wife pointed out some

content.detailedDescription:
Walking to a friend's apt. with my dog. looked up in the sky and thought it was a plane with bright red lights, then thought it was a plane on fire. once i realized it was neither of them i thought it may be mars the red planet because the starlike object in the sky gave off a red hue. i was perplexed by this object so i kept watching it as i walked down the road. since i was walking i couldn't tell if it was moving so i stopped to see if it was moving. after stopping i realized it was stationary just up in the sky in the north east part of the sky at about 65 to 70�� off the horizon. there were clouds that moved quickly across the sky towards the north and you could see this red light through those clouds, it was that bright. i watched this light for about 12 minutes and when i met up with my friend i told her to look up in the sky and see this and right as she started looking up in the sky the light went away. it just disappeared, didn't move, didn't blink, didn't flash, just dissolved. it was very weird. i continued to walk around my complex for about the next hour and it was a gorgeous night with stars out everywhere and that light was nowhere to be seen in the same area of the sky, it was just gone. 

when i was a kid i had the opportunity to see two ufos. both separate incidences, one when i was about 8 and the other when i was about 11. both ufos were very different. i don't talk about it much because i think people would view me as crazy if i talked about it. my point in telling this is that i believe in ufos and i know what i saw last night was very strange. although i didn't see an object itself it was just a light in the sky, i know that what i saw was nothing man made nor could anyone explain what it was. 

i thought it was really strange that when another person have the opportunity to view it, such as my friend, it dissolved immediately upon her looking up in the sky. weird.
content.summary: Reddish orange at first starlike light in the sky, mainly red towards the end, very strong light, could see through clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the front of my house getting the mail out of the street side mail box. you could hear fire works going off so i looked up and saw a orange orb slowly floating from the north/west to south. it was moving to slow to be a airplane and there was no sound what so ever. i know it wasn't fireworks. i then ran in the house to get my cell phone. i went out onto my patio to try and take video of the orb. it was gone. you can hear the fireworks and the traffic behind my house. there is a main road right behind my house. then i saw two orange orb's moving in a southerly direction they maintained a equal distant's from one another. i was able to get video of the two before they got to far away to be seen in my video. the next thing i new there was another single orb heading from the north/west to the south. i was also able to video this orb. when the orb got to be overhead it disappeared. no other orb's were witnessed. i then went inside my house to transfer the video's from my cell phone to my computer.
content.summary: 4 ufo's orange glow with white light

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:30 pm on 7/2/2014, i was relaxing in hammock looking at sky as i normally do on clear nights.  i watched a satellite traveling ne direction above me, and within 2 - 3 minutes this huge fireball appeared flying in the same direction and seemingly same general area in the sky.  i have never seen anything that big, with orange or amber light.  i had enough time to run to house to call for boyfriend to come look.  he came out and was able to witness it as well.  it was flying at a controlled speed, not like a comet/meteor/falling star.  it was a constant glow, not sure if it was cigar shaped or simply had a tail of some sort.  both he and i agree that we have never seen anything like that before.  was very exciting.  we watched it for about 3 minutes, then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Huge fireball flew over house and watched til disappeared.  slower than comet/meteor.  too large to be any known object.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside at approximately 10pm june 18, 2014 and looked up at the cloudless sky.  saw a star-sized single unblinking white light coming from nw.  it appeared to be very high in the sky because of its size.  it was at about "10 oclock in the sky" (or about 45 degrees.)  

it was moving in a straight direction, but was moving in an s-curve, snake-like fashion.  if i were to have held a ruler at arm's length to measure the pattern, it would have been a half-inch wide and half-inch diameter continuous s-curve.  it maintained that pattern as it crossed the sky -- first appearing over the mountains to the nw, and then disappearing over the "horizon" of the mountains to the se.

the s-curve flight pattern never changed.  it was consistent during its path across the sky, which i do not believe was an arc (it seemed like it was maintaining a consistent altitude.)  i would estimate it took about 10 seconds to cross the sky.  it's speed was similar to an airplane.  the "vehicle" did not seem to be out of control at all.  my interpretation of the s-curve pattern was that it was intentional and fully under control.  i say that because it was so consistent and precise.

at the time i saw it,  i thought the "vehicle" was moving in a "cork-screw" fashion, which (because of my ground-level perspective) appeared to me as an s-curve.  that's a very subjective interpretation.  simply an assumption on my part.  i can only say with certainty that it appeared to be a "flat" s-curve pattern.

i had gone outside with the intention of looking at the star-filled sky.  where i live in maryland, the city lights make for poor night-sky visibility.  i'm fascinated by the subject of ufos, so as i looked up into the starry sky, i hoped to see one.  i spotted this "vehicle" almost instantly. 

there were no other witnesses.  i had no camera, etc.
content.summary: Star-sized, unblinking white light flying in s-curve snake-like fashion from nw to se across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the top of my roof ,before going to roof ,i had some strange feeling to to go on the roof quickly and nothing was going on  after that feeling was started . even can't imagine that i may have the ufo sighting there.I just don't know much about them but after doing lot of research to my best ,it was not man made,not natural. i also researched about alien abduction and finally get to the result that whatever feeling/symptoms the alien abductee have while alien abduction , i also have the same feeling/symptoms since i was 7 years old and some how  it enhanced now.

and one more thing about ufo i observed is that it hovered in circular path and pulsated white light like those of flourecent tube lights mystiriously vanished . that's all what happened that time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An unkown cigar shaped ufo hovered on a distance,on the top of my roof

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on our deck and my boyfriend shouted look look look and pointed to the sky. we both observed a light transparent object moving from south to north at a very fast pace. no sound was noticed. within 10 min there was 7 planes in the sky moving from north to south and east to west. we felt awe struck and scared after we realized what we had just saw. we lost sight of the object due to a tree.
content.summary: Long straight line, misty or transparent, see-through
